messages.body: $AAPL $MSFT $FB - Apple And Microsoft Are Healthier Than Facebook  https://www.bloomberg.com/view/articles/2018-03-30/apple-and-microsoft-are-healthier-than-facebook

links.title: Why Apple and Microsoft Are Healthier Than Facebook
links.description: It's easy to understand Apple CEO Tim Cook's somewhat self-righteous comments on the Facebook-Cambridge Analytica scandal: His company has never emphasized customer data monetization, and privacy has been one of its persistent selling points. Apple still collects our data - and reserves the right to share it - but the company has a much better track record than newer tech titans.

messages.body: $WB $NVDA $SQ $NOW $SHOP If the FAANGs have got you down, it’s time to win with the WNSSS stocks https://www.marketwatch.com/Story/if-the-faangs-have-got-you-down-its-time-to-win-with-the-wnsss-stocks-2018-03-29?&siteihttps://stocktwits.com/messages/412392d=yhoof2&yptr=yahoo$FB $AAPL $AMZN $NFLX

links.title: If the FAANGs have got you down, it's time to win with the WNSSS stocks
links.description: By A lot of attention has been paid to the so-called FAANG stocks over the past few years, and for good reason. Investor Jim Cramer coined this now-popular acronym in 2013, identifying the most dominant tech investments of the day: Facebook Amazon Netflix and Google ; Apple was later shoehorned into the list after overcoming rockiness that year.
